backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing imageâ€‘related fixes, assets, and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the PawfectCareLanding component as the app entry.
frontend/src/components/icons/MobileInHa: SVG icon component depicting a hand holding a mobile phone.
frontend/src/components/PawfectCareLandi: Main landing page component containing hero, services, testimonials, gallery, and FAQ with SafeImage for assets.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component with load/error handling and fallback UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes plus global base and SafeImage fallback styles.
frontend/src/lib/publicAssetUrl.ts: Exports a helper that prepends the Vite base URL to asset paths for reliable static asset resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors based on CSS variables, extended theme settings, plugins, and dark mode.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, goals, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the grooming landing page.
